channel.title: Macos on 乱世浮生
channel.description: Recent content in Macos on 乱世浮生

item.title: Kubernetes学习 — Macos安装Kubernetes
item.description: Kubernetes 安装 macos 检查环境 sysctl -a | grep machdep.cpu.features | grep VMX 安装VirtualBox http://download.virtualbox.org/virtualbox/5.1.26/Oracle_VM_VirtualBox_Extension_Pack-5.1.26-117224.vbox-extpack 安装minikube curl -Lo minikube https://storage.googleapis.com/minikube/releases/v0.21.0/minikube-darwin-amd64 && chmod +x minikube && sudo mv minikube /usr/local/bin/ 创建集群 默认使用virtualbox
